column4: i'm running ubuntu live cd on my laptop next to me... it's connected via land line (nic).. i want to install 'make' .. can someone advise please
not sure how (under ubuntu) to find/install packages that contain a particular program
i was using the gui package manager
my notebook is know running well
lol.. in the gui app? i did.. maybe the live cd just doesn't have a full package list
type make, if it does not find it, then page down
ahh. .just saw the gui synaptic package mangaer i was using "Add Application"
